Package com.flipfit.dao

Interface FlipFitBookingDAOInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
FlipFitBookingDAO
public interface FlipFitBookingDAOInterface
Data Access Object (DAO) interface for handling booking-related operations in FlipFit system. This interface defines methods for adding, retrieving, canceling bookings, checking booking overlaps, and managing customer plans.
Author:
Ravi Teja

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addBooking(String name, String scheduleId)
    Adds a booking for a user identified by their username and schedule ID.

    Checks if there is any overlap in bookings for a customer on a specific date and time.

    Retrieves a booking based on its booking ID.

      name - ,scheduleId ID of the schedule to book

      Retrieves all bookings made by a customer identified by their customer ID.
      Parameters:
      customerId - ID of the customer
      Returns:
      List of bookings made by the customer

    • getCustomerPlan

      List<UserPlan> getCustomerPlan(String customerId)
      Retrieves the plan details of a customer identified by their customer ID.
      Parameters:
      customerId - ID of the customer
      Returns:
      List of user plans associated with the customer

    • cancelBookingById

      void cancelBookingById(String bookingId)
      Cancels a booking based on its ID.
      Parameters:
      bookingId - ID of the booking to cancel

    • checkBookingOverlap

      boolean checkBookingOverlap(String customerId, Date date, LocalTime localTime)
      Checks if there is any overlap in bookings for a customer on a specific date and time.
      Parameters:
      customerId - ,date,localTime Time of the booking
      Returns:
      True if there is an overlap, false otherwise
